snippet: Mayor Arthur Ward of Bristol. Conn., said he would no longer oppose local firefighters’ wearing the T-shirts to honor National Breast Cancer Awareness Month.
abstract: Mayor Arthur Wald of Bristol, Conn, says he will no longer oppose local firefighters wearing pink T-shirts to promote breast cancer awareness, reversing his earlier position; Wald says the controversy stirred by public outcry was becoming bigger than the cause.
lead_paragraph: Mayor Arthur Ward of Bristol. Conn., said he would no longer oppose local firefighters’ wearing the T-shirts to honor National Breast Cancer Awareness Month.

headline.seo: Mayor in Bristol, Conn., Now Says Firefighters’ Pink Shirts Are Fine
headline.main: Changing His Mind, a Connecticut Mayor Says Firefighters May Wear Pink
headline.print_headline: Changing His Mind, a Connecticut Mayor Says Firefighters May Wear Pink
